user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable and well-fitting underwear that would provide all-day wearability without irritation.
purchase_reason: I purchased these due to the promise of comfort and softness, as well as the appeal of a tagless design. However, the sizing was completely off, and the material did not match the expectations set by the description, leading to a frustrating experience.

I was drawn to the comfort features highlighted in the description, such as the secure fit and non-binding waistband. Unfortunately, the sizing was inaccurate, and the material felt inadequate, which made the purchase disappointing.

I was looking for breathable and comfortable underwear that would suit an active lifestyle. The features mentioned, like breathable mesh panels and friction guard seams, were appealing, but the sizing issues and thin material made it a poor choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer clothing items that are comfortable, well-fitting, and durable. I value products that maintain their size and shape after washing, as I have experienced issues with shrinkage in the past. I appreciate classic styles that can be worn casually and are versatile enough to pair with various outfits. Additionally, I tend to favor items that offer good value for money, even if they are not the highest quality. On the other hand, I dislike products that have poor sizing, thin materials, or that do not provide the comfort they promise. I am particularly sensitive to fit issues, especially with undergarments, and I find it frustrating when items do not meet my expectations in terms of comfort and durability.

Our experts designed them with a Comfort Flex速 waistband that flexes and moves with you. Each pair of boxer brief underwear has a no-ride-up design, so they'll stay put no matter what your day holds. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer when they need a quick refresh. And our favorite feature part of all? These men's black boxer brief underwear sets have different waistband colors and also come in multiple size options, from Small to extended sizes like 3XL, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Men's 5pk Beyondsoft Boxer Brief> / Item ID: B071NJDDTW / Price: $16.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["Looking for your next go-to pair of underwear Fruit of the Loom men's beyond soft boxer briefs, 5-pack offer the comfort and style of a boxer combined with the support of a brief. Beyond soft is made of durable fabric that shrinks less than 100 percent cotton. Plus, beyond soft naturally wicks moisture away, keeping you feeling dry all day. The traditional fly provides support and the soft waistband will keep you comfortable in every situation. The Fruit of the Loom men's beyond soft boxer brief, 5-pack offers our legs don't ride up feature ensuring the legs stay in place all day. Each Fruit of the Loom men's beyond soft boxer brief is designed tag free for all day comfort and shrinks less wash after wash."]

Plus, you can throw them right in the washer on laundry day. We also love how these tagless boxer brief underwear sets are available in multiple color and pack options, so you can choose the one that works best for you."]
